events.name: Montreal Canadiens at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — Morgan Rielly broke a tie at 9:02 of the third period and the Toronto Maple Leafs beat the Montreal Canadiens 5-2 on Wednesday night in the regular-season opener for both teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Morgan Rielly breaks 3rd-period tie in the Maple Leafs' 5-2 opening victory over the Canadiens

headlines.description: — David Pastrnak had a goal and two assists and Jeremy Swayman made 35 saves in the Boston Bruins' 3-1 victory over Alex Ovechkin and the Washington Capitals on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pastrnak has a 3-point night in the Bruins' 3-1 victory over Ovechkin and the Capitals

headlines.description: — Nazem Kadri scored in the eighth round of a shootout to give the Calgary Flames a 4-3 comeback victory over Edmonton on Wednesday night, spoiling Oilers star <a...

events.name: Los Angeles Kings at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Adrian Kempe and Trevor Moore scored during the shootout and the Los Angeles Kings spoiled Pavel Dorofeyev's hat trick and Mitch Marner's debut in a Vegas uniform with a 6-5 win over the Golden Knights on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kings top Golden Knights 6-5 in shootout, spoiling Dorofeyev's hat trick and Marner's debut
